oai_dc:dc.dc:title: GENERATION OF INFRAGRAVITY WAVES IN BREAKING PROCESS OF WAVE GROUPS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nakamura, Satoshi
Katoh, Kazumasa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave groups
breaking process
wave breaking
infragravity waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To understand the cross-shore distribution of the wave groups and the infragravity waves in a storm, field observations have been carried out at the Hazaki Oceanographical Research Facility. The relationship between the wave groups and the infragravity waves is examined. The infragravity waves are generated in the wave breaking process of the wave groups. The observed heights of infragravity waves in the surf zone agree well with the predicted one by modified Symonds' model, in which a time delay of small wave breaking due to propagation is taken into consideration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
